about.description: Hi, I'm Magda. Iâ€™m passionate about the world of front-end development, discovering something new every day. Working in this field presents exciting challenges that allow me to combine creativity with functionality. I love creating projects that not only look great but also offer intuitive and thoughtful solutions. It requires both analytical thinking and artistic approach. On a daily basis, I work with Angular, and in my spare time, I expand my skills by learning React, which helps me stay up-to-date with the latest front-end trends.

hero.description: With a passion for creating modern, creative, and functional applications.

0.title: My Portfolio Website
0.description: A portfolio website built in React, inspired by a project from https://www.behance.net

1.title: Songs Book
1.description: A guitar songbook, with an admin option, allowing the logged-in user to add, edit, or delete songs. It features a left sidebar from which you can add songs to the right panel, where there's a print-to-PDF option. Songs have a chord transposition feature and a search function.

2.title: Background Catcher - mobile
2.description: A mobile app for downloading and saving backgrounds on smartphones. This app is integrated with the Unsplash API, allowing you to get your favorite wallpapers by category, randomly, save and download them. The app is built using Ionic-Angular and leverages NGRX for practicing this library. Database - Firebase.

3.title: Older Portfolio Site
3.description: My older version of the portfolio website.
